short_description: business world travel inc. is a travel agency based in new york, united states.
long_description:
business world travel like its name suggests specializes in business travel. started in 2005 in new york city, business world travel is one of the leading travel providers in the industry. the company holds affiliations with vendors of various travel products. due to their buying power, the company is able to negotiate aggressive deals on air, hotels, car rentals to pass the savings on to the consumer. for the business traveler our private negotiated contract airfares ensures that we cut control and manage your business travel expenses by upto 30%for the luxury traveler who enjoys the finer things in life, we offer a wide selection of unpublished heavily discounted cheap business and first class airfares on most major airlines that will save you upto 30-70%. weather you are a business traveler or high end luxury traveler
we find the best-value solution to enhance your travel experience and minimize costs. all the footwork for you so you travel cost-effectively and effortlessly. our business travel experts offer world class support via phone or email chat and facebook business world travel management services include:> corporate travel management > exclusive discounts up to 70% off on business or first class international air fares.> no advance purchase airfares > any routing, any airline, including multi-airlines combinations.> upgrades from economy to business, from business to first class cabin. > privately negotiated rates on airfares with most major carriers.> last-minute travel -huge savings. > in-flight seat and meal assignments.> business travel experts available anytime via phone or email. > product and service guarantee • price meet or beat policy accredited by bbb. member of: iatan• please feel free to contact us with any questions regarding personal or corporate travel. we can be reached at corporate@businessworldtravel.com. business world travel can be found on the following social sites: https://www.facebook.com/pages/business-world-travel
